name: Nintendoodle
description:
Nintendoodle is a Doodle Jump redesign for the NES, made in under a week for the Retro Game Jam 2021.

Credits (Alphabetical Order)

  • Adam Brady - Programming and Implementation
  • Cian MacNamee - Art and Animation
  • Laura Pennington - Art and Animation
  • Vladimir Dainovski - Programming and Implementation

Special Thanks to Neale Davidson for the 'Pixel NES' font
